snippet.title: Dev Diary | The Journey to Console
snippet.description:
“We wanted to make sure we took the time to get it right on every single platform, [and] it’s the first time we’re launching a cross-platform game where everyone can play together in multiplayer.” – Paul “Rushy” Rustchynsky, Game Director

CASTING THE NET WIDER - Call of the Wild: The Angler's Journey to Console 

In this developer diary, the team takes five to talk about the evolution of The Angler since its release on PC in August of 2022, as well as their journey towards bringing the game to console one year later.


Call of the Wild: The Angler releases August 30 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One! It will also join Xbox Game Pass and Game Pass for PC at launch.

Read this article to learn more: https://avlche.com/TAConsoleDate


🎣 Visit The Angler website: https://avlche.com/COTWTheAngler


◈ Join the #COTWTheAngler Community:

 • Discord:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerDiscord
 • Reddit:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerReddit
 • Twitter:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerTW
 • Instagram:  https://avlche.com/TAIG
 • Twitch:  https://avlche.com/EWTwitch
 • YouTube: https://avlche.com/EWYT
 • Facebook:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerFB
